title: Negative Happy ChainSaw Edge [2008] Subs.
description:
Negative Happy ChainSaw Edge [2008]English Subs.

Sorry, forgot to include in torrent.





Subs, how to use :-


Media Player Classic - play the movie, then with right click on the screen go to Filters > DirectVobSub and choose English (You need to have installed DirectVobSub at your PC).


VLC Player - play the movie, then with right click on the screen go to Subtitles Track and choose Track 2 - [English] (Works without codecs).


Some movies have .idx and .sub files wich combines subs for different languages - you have to manually activate the eng./etc. subs.

If the .srt/.idx/.sub file(s) isn't/aren't named exactly the same as the avi/mkv/mp4 file(s), it is better to rename them to match with the avi/mkv/mp4 file(s).
